feed.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Contract Primitives and Upgrades to Bitcoin

entry.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Contract Primitives and Upgrades to Bitcoin
entry.summary: Jeremy Rubin, a Bitcoin developer, has recently published a blog post on his website rubin.io covering various proposed primitives that he believes the Bitcoin community is actively considering and researching. In the post, Rubin provides a high-level overview of these primitives and invites readers to suggest any additional proposals that may have been overlooked.Rubin's post serves as a mini SoK (State of Knowledge) for the Bitcoin community, providing basic details of each proposed primitive. He notes that these ideas are relatively well researched and widely discussed within the community.Rubin's website offers a platform for readers to engage with the post and provide feedback on potential changes or additions to the list of proposed primitives. This open dialogue fosters a collaborative environment for Bitcoin developers and enthusiasts alike.In conclusion, Jeremy Rubin's blog post sheds light on several new proposed primitives in the Bitcoin community and encourages further discussion and collaboration among developers. The post can be found on his website at rubin.io/bitcoin/2021/12/05/advent-8/.
